result.shortName: TOYO INK SC HOLDINGS CO. LTD.
result.longName: Toyo Ink SC Holdings Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Toyo Ink SC Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the colorants and functional materials, polymers and coatings, printing and information, and packaging materials businesses in Japan, China, the United States, India, Turkey, Indonesia, and internationally. The company's colorants and functional materials include general purpose pigments, functional pigments, functional and pigment dispersions, plastic colorants, color filter materials, resist materials for LCD/imaging sensor, coating materials for data recording, and inkjet inks; and polymers and coatings comprise adhesives, laminating adhesives, hot-melt adhesives, water-based resins, can and functional/hard coatings, medical products, and natural extracts, as well as electronic materials, adhesives tapes and films, and marking films. Its printing and information products include offset, ultraviolet curable, newspaper, metal decorative, and screen-printing inks; and packaging materials comprise gravure and flexographic inks, as well as solvents for gravure printing. The company also provides printing materials and machinery; prepress systems; and other products. Toyo Ink SC Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1896 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

companyOfficers.name: Tetsuaki  Sato
companyOfficers.title: Director in charge of Qlty Ass., Prod., Envi., Sustblty & Purch. and GM of Prod. Logi. Div. & Dir.
